why: Explored Java Spring Boot in more detail, dived deep in planning and execution
companyLoved4Points: SDE intern at FedEx printAndGo product team, responsible for modernizing the legacy application
Implemented newer functionality, while ensuring legacy systems work with it
Tested and deepened understanding of development best practices
Focused on working as a team, and working as a team

companyDetailPoints.description: Developed apis for microservice based application, focusing on modularity.

Implemented workflow of new apis, understanding the requirements, and ensuring the best possible performance, by reading RFC standards(eg- multipart form data). Highlighted performance critical bottlenecks, and ideated on ways on which it can be improved.
Designed an algorithm to generate unique codes considering concurrency, and scalability
Developed apis on Java; data access with Spring JdbcTemplate, async Web Client(OAuth), Jenkins, and PCF(Cloud Foundry)

highlights.name: Application memory monitoring
stmt: Used jVisualVM for monitoring the application for memory footprint, and suggested ways for future improvement.
